title: 5.5 Acres hilly land and 2 storied house sale(IDR6)
details:
5 acres 88 perches land
2 storied villa type under construction house
Small stream below the land
Direct access to the land
5 km to Imaduwa town
7 km to highway entrance at Imaduwa
Well water and electricity
Ideal for a villa or replant tea or cinnamon
